admin/editor.info-card.title: InfoCard
admin/editor.info-card.description: A component with image and text which you can choose how to display
admin/editor.info-card.isFullModeStyle.d: If true, the provided image will be used as background image and text will be displayed over it
admin/editor.info-card.textPosition.desc: Choose the component position where the text will be displayed: left, center, or right
admin/editor.info-card.headline.title: Headline
admin/editor.info-card.subhead.title: Subheader
admin/editor.info-card.body-text.title: Body text
Controls how your call to action is displayed
admin/editor.info-card.callToActionLinkT: Link opens in a new tab
Link opens in the same tab
admin/editor.info-card.callToActionUrl.d: Redirect URL when CTA is clicked
admin/editor.info-card.imageUrl.title: Image
admin/editor.info-card.mobileImageUrl.de: Image to be used on mobile
admin/editor.info-card.textAlignment.des: Controls the text alignment inside component
admin/editor.info-card.textMode.title: Text mode
admin/editor.info-card.textMode.descript: Text mode InfoCard will receive. HTML is the default, and rich text enables you to use markdown.
admin/editor.info-card.imageActionUrl.de: Pass the URL to turn the image into a link and be able to redirect the user
admin/editor.info-card.startDate.title: Start Date
admin/editor.info-card.endDate.title: End date
